snippet: As part of the federal budget bill passed this week, retirees will no longer be permitted to use certain strategies to increase the amount they collect by as much as tens of thousands of dollars.
abstract: Federal budget bill eliminates certain claiming strategies for Social Security, which could add up to tens of thousands of dollars for retirees; loopholes permitted people to collect spousal benefits while they continued to collect more money for themselves.
lead_paragraph: As part of the federal budget bill passed this week, retirees will no longer be permitted to use certain strategies to increase the amount they collect by as much as tens of thousands of dollars.

headline.print_headline: Social Security Loopholes, Rarely Used, Now Closed
headline.main: Rarely Used Social Security Loopholes, Worth Thousands of Dollars, Closed
